headerDisplay: Modern Homebridge plugin for Somfy Protect home security systems. For help and documentation please see the [GitHub repository](https://github.com/yourusername/homebridge-somfy-protect).
footerDisplay: If you have multiple sites, check your Homebridge logs to find the site IDs.

name.title: Name
name.description: The name that will appear in your Homebridge log.

username.title: Username
username.description: Your Somfy Protect account email address

siteId.title: Site ID (Optional)
siteId.description: If you have multiple sites, specify which site to use. Check logs to find site IDs.

pollingInterval.title: Polling Interval (ms)
pollingInterval.description: How often to check for status updates (milliseconds). Default is 10000 (10 seconds).

httpPort.title: üåê HTTP API Port
httpPort.description: Port for the HTTP API used by automation plugins. Set to 0 to disable.

httpToken.title: üîí HTTP API Token
httpToken.description: Optional token for securing the HTTP API. If set, requests must include 'Authorization: Bearer YOUR_TOKEN' header.
